pr_title: Port optimizations for primitive set operations to SetIterables.

timeline.bodyText: the order doesn't seem to make any difference here...
timeline.author: mohrezaei

replies.bodyText: Yes, I changed back to optimizing union so I can use UnifiedSet.newSet(setA) or UnifiedSet.newSet(setB), and reverted unionInto.
replies.author: donraab

timeline.message:
Port optimizations for primitive set operations to SetIterables.

Signed-off-by: Donald Raab <Donald.Raab@bnymellon.com>
